title: Kaliandra
author: Kaliandra
content: I don't have experience in altcoins, but I have quite an interest in investing in altcoins, but when I hear the news that investing in altcoins is very dangerous because the potential for losses is so big, but I found out on the internet, it turns out that we can invest in altcoins as long as the in quality altcoins,and finally I saw on cmc that the number 1 altcoin is ethereum, and finally I'm quite interested if I have the capital to want to invest in ethereum.and I saw the news that it turned out that a lot of people were investing in ethereum because the ethereum project is very good and has a lot of fans. and I want to ask everyone?: does ethereum have a good future?: is it not wrong if I choose to invest in ethereum?: what is the drawback of ethereum?: why is ethereum the no. 1 ALTCOIN?

In the long run, I don’t know what the final result will be, but it is currently the digital currency with the richest ecology and the best investment value. As the second largest digital currency by market value, its status and community strength are also the strongest. Ethereum is also the most powerful example of decentralized finance

comments.author: Kasun@1995
comments.body: Ethereum is the most potential altcoin as compared to Binance,Ripple,ADA in the current market.ADA is the potential coin as in current market conditions,but Ethereum will be the best compared to the potential ADA for the long term investment.As we know Ethereum will be the next bitcoin in the market.Ethereum is the centralised crypto currency and its enough to hold the Ethereum for the long term as compared to the ADA.The price of Ethereum will increase to the value of 3000 in this year.Kindly hold your Ethereum for the longer period.

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Ethereum is a No. 1 altcoin but that project had a big change to switch from Proof of Work to Proof of Stake.Its network now is very centralized and with centralization, transactions can be censored. It is not good with the possibility of censorship, manipulation from centralized investors or groups of investor.I still consider Ethereum as a best altcoin but investment always has risk.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: Instead of you confused about which altcoin is potential, which will be difficult to find, even though it is ethereum, you better invest in bitcoin using DCA. Maybe ethereum has a good future because it is still no. 1 in altcoins but everything can change when there is a new technology that can compete with ethereum and of course, the other coin can replace the ethereum position.You can invest in ethereum because ethereum is at the top of the altcoin market. But be careful because we don't know how the altcoin market will be and keep investing in bitcoin as the main investment.

comments.body: I really like the statement that there are Bitcoin, Ethereum and other altcoins on the cryptocurrency market, thereby putting ETH on a par with BTC. Despite the fact that Ethereum switched to POS last year, I believe that Ethereum has a very high potential, which we have not fully understood yet, and for this reason its current value is greatly underestimated.

It is because they know it was not really dangerous when you are doing it personally. All of these are presumptions from a person who is mentally affected by their losses due to investing the wrong coins. If they just investing in Ethereum, they are actually safe but because they get hyped from believing developers, huge offers (x1000), and it leads them to get nothing (losses). Focus on your goal OP and invest in ETH without a doubt, I was sure you get what you are trying to wish for before investing.

comments.body: Quote from: Kaliandra on January 13, 2023, 03:58:47 AMI don't have experience in altcoins, but I have quite an interest in investing in altcoins, but when I hear the news that investing in altcoins is very dangerous because the potential for losses is so big, but I found out on the internet, it turns out that we can invest in altcoins as long as the in quality altcoins,They're not wrong, altcoins are risky because most of them are new scammy projects. There are old ones, but the profits you'd get aren't as big compared to investing in a completely new project that will grow. For ETH, I wouldn't really guarantee that it has a good future, any project has really if you think about it. Comparing it to other altcoins though, it has better chances of standing in the future as a big name (if it isn't already is) among cryptos. I myself have kept a part of my portfolio recently into ETH. If you're debating, then going for a DCA method isn't that wrong, especially if we consider how the prospects of ETH is better than other new altcoins out there.

comments.author: len01
comments.body: I say ethereum is the queen of the king of bitcoin and for the future ethereum doesn't need to be doubted anymore after you can research ethereum's track record long ago. ETH has always had great potential and future when buying at a bearish time and holding on until a bullish party arrives.but as some members have said here that investing in crypto is very risky and you have to really be prepared for all risks and you need to research everything before you start investing in ethereum.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: Kaliandra on January 13, 2023, 03:58:47 AM: does ethereum have a good future?: is it not wrong if I choose to invest in ethereum?: what is the drawback of ethereum?: why is ethereum the no. 1 ALTCOIN?Even though i am also just a normal dude with no inside knowledge about cryptocurrency in general and also not about Ethereum, i will try to answer your questions. I think Ethereum definitely has a good future, next to bitcoin it is by far the most popular and also the biggest crypto project out there and if Ethereum should really fail, then 99% of the other altcoins will probably die way before that.ETH is the number 1 altcoin because they invented the whole smart contract functionality. Without that feature we would not have stuff like tokens, NFT's, Defi, Dexes, Yiel farms and other stuff today. All those other platforms like (Solana, Cardano) are basically just copying what Ethereum has invented.

Because many people lost their money from investing in this and that possibly happens to you also if you are too careless with your decision. ETH has been in the market for so long and it shows a satisfying performance that is why people never give up from investing this even during the dip.

In my opinion Ethereum is a good investment.
